content: knit 2 together pm= place marker kf&b= increase by knitting into the front & back of stitch ssk= slip 2 sts one at a time as if to knit insert left needle into fronts of these 2 sts from left to right and k2tog in this position y/o= yarn over bring yarn in between and then over right hand needle ws= wrong side rs= right side bor=beg of round m1l= with left needle pick up bar between st just worked and next st on left needle from front to back and knit through the back m1r= with left needle pick up bar between st just worked and next st on left needle from back to front and knit through the front cdd= centered double decrease slip two stitches as if to k2tog to right needle k1 slip the two stitches over the knitted stitch wyif = with yarn in front wyib = with yarn in back k1tbl or p1tbl = k1 through the back loop or p1 through back loop sl = slip round=round mc=main color cc=contrast color __________________________________________________________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission
